entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 11. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
